ClassDecl.Name: ListViewColumnItemArranger
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>List view column item arranger. This arranger contains column headers. When an column header is resized, all items will be notified via the <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::list::ListViewColumnItemArranger::IColumnItemView@s:vl.presentation.controls.list.ListViewColumnItemArranger" /></links> for <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::GuiListControl::IItemProvider@s:vl.presentation.controls.GuiListControl" /></links>.</summary> </Document>

ClassDecl.Name: IColumnItemViewCallback
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Callback for <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::controls::list::ListViewColumnItemArranger::IColumnItemView@s:vl.presentation.controls.list.ListViewColumnItemArranger" /></links>. Column item view use this interface to notify column related modification.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: OnColumnChanged
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Called when any column is changed (inserted, removed, text changed, etc.).</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: AttachCallback
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Attach an column item view callback to this view.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="value">The column item view callback.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: DetachCallback
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Detach an column item view callback from this view.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="value">The column item view callback.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetColumnCount
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the number of all columns.</summary> <returns>The number of all columns.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetColumnText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the text of the column.</summary> <returns>The text of the column.</returns> <param name="index">The index of the column.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetColumnSize
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the size of the column.</summary> <returns>The size of the column.</returns> <param name="index">The index of the column.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetColumnSize
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the size of the column.</summary> <param name="index">The index of the column.</param> <param name="value">The new size of the column.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetDropdownPopup
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the popup binded to the column.</summary> <returns>The popup binded to the column.</returns> <param name="index">The index of the column.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetSortingState
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the sorting state of the column.</summary> <returns>The sorting state of the column.</returns> <param name="index">The index of the column.</param> </Document>
